RoomGenerator

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomGenerator.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile object to represent a space in our 2D Map array.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int currentCost
      The current number of tiles in the path.
      Tile parent
      In a path, the parent denotes what tile came immediately before this one in the path
      int priority
      Used to sort the priority queue of tiles.
      private char tileType
      The tile type, denoting if it's a room tile, halltile, player/zombie spawn.
      boolean visited
      If the tile was visited during a pathfinding session
      private int x
      The x value.
      private int y
      The y value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(char c, int x, int y)
      Instantiates a new tile.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getTileType()
      Gets the tile type, generally useful to know if it's a wall tile, the end point, or it's pathable.
      int getX()
      Gets the x value of the tile in the 2D Tile[][] array.
      int getY()
      Gets the y value of the tile in the 2D Tile[][] array..
      void printPath(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> p)
      Prints the path from the target tile (in our application, the target tile is always the player's tile) back to the zombie's tile.
      void reset()
      Reset's the tile to have it ready for the next Pathfinder process
      void setTileType(char c)
      Sets the tile type.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
